title: zeds aren't even building  dusk blade anymore.
body: I don't understand what was the point of that item. Zeds are building hyrda now what the fuck man.

replies.body: Doesn't majority of gameplay and #balance still believe that duskblade is op? lol
Dusblade isn't that great on Zed lol. It never was.

Zed never needed Duskblade, having two of the same ultimates isn't always a good thing especially when his own ultimate gets the job done pretty darn well, there comes a point where its just overkill and unnecessary.

Ghostblade is a better rush item.
Hydra is better for splitpush.
Duskblade is probably ok, if you think that they will CC and kill you after the ult.

I don't see why a zed wouldn't build duskblade, it's a second ult. Hydra definitely isn't bad, but duskblade is too good to pass up on zed.
[Edit] Is this a meme? I don't see any zed in your previous games, I looked up to the past 9 days.
Duskblade fits more with an assassin that auto attacks or had an AA modifier, like Talon or Kha'Zix. Zed is more of a caster, he mainly only uses his spells when he goes in to assassinate
